article_title: 4 things to know about PPACA and dental
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

As a result of implementation of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, it’s important for employers to recognize that traditional dental plans can be very cost-effective.

Read: Dental coverage is key to a healthy smile (and company)
